A Whopping 30+ Artists Are Gearing Up to Play At ‘Délirium’ Festival Next Month

Posted by Brittany Prevost on May 25, 2022

TICKETS

Festival season is officially in full swing! If you're like us, you're quickly mapping out your summer calendar, and we have another event you'll immediately want to jot down. On Friday, June 10, 2022, through Saturday, June 11, 2022, Délirium is back with its highly-anticipated second edition. Trust us, you won't want to miss it!

The bass/dubstep festival is making its triumphant return in Papineauville, Quebec. Get ready for a weekend of camping with some likeminded individuals, and some serious bass in your face! If you've been to Lost Lands, you may be familiar with Sound Camps; Délirium promises their own version, guaranteed to satisfy your lingering bass desires.

Some of the hottest names in the world of bass are gearing up to take the decks. Due to the intimate setting, you'll have the opportunity to catch exclusive performances, and perhaps even mingle with some of the talent. The organizers have curated an impressive lineup. A truly jaw-dropping programming with over 30+ artists is in store. Check out the official lineup below...

Since the festival is but a mere couple of weeks away, the extra early and early bird tickets have sold out. However, regular bird passes remain available for purchase here. In addition, there is a slight cost discount on Friday compared to Saturday should you wish to attend only on one day.

Keep it locked to Délirium's Facebook event for more details, including rules, vendors, camping FAQs, and more. Another thing to note is the soon-to-be epic giant campfire that you won't want to miss! We look forward to hearing about your experience; reach out to us on our socials. Have fun, Flag fam!

Written By Brittany Prevost
